  2. Et Cetera

Submit to Mossy Bits, UW CSE’s creative arts journal!

I have a superior calendar feed for department colloquia. Subscribe with iCal or Google Calendar.

Maybe you ride Washington State Ferries and use an iPhone. You’re in luck.

I also wrote a geeky command-line tool for managing your music collection. It’s called beets and it’s unquestionably the best.

Try my tasteless podcast about popular music, Chartstoppers. Recorded with the inimitable Eric Peterson.

Perhaps you need a little inspiration. Try five random words.
